thread.title: Transgender in Colorado: "Living a genuine life means being honest with who you are"
thread.title_full: Transgender in Colorado: "Living a genuine life means being honest with who you are" - The Denver Post

author: Jennifer Brown
title: Transgender in Colorado: "Living a genuine life means being honest with who you are"
text:
Army Staff Sgt. Patricia King is among an estimated 15,500 transgender troops who are banned by military policy and yet continue to serve their country. While she and others await results of an official review, Trish must play the role of male soldier while on duty at Fort Carson.
Not redirecting? Experience the full immersive presentation here .
